bug.author: stelek
bug.summary: parseFromFile returns `true` if it failed to parse file.
bug.description:
This code is wrong:
onnx-tensorrt/ModelImporter.cpp
Line 630 in 7ec88b9
return EXIT_FAILURE;
It returns EXIT_FAILURE which is apparently not 0, while function return type is bool.

comments.comment: Because of this bug, it returns true when the file does not exist... ğŸ™„
Thanks for the report. Fixed in the above MR.
